'''''Font of All Waters (II)''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Fontaine: Dance of the Dew-White Springs (II)]]''. To complete this achievement, the player must unlock all [[Teleport Waypoint]]s in the following areas: [[Liffey Region]] and [[Fontaine Research Institute of Kinetic Energy Engineering Region]].
